 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָפַר‎</span>] **verb** dubious; — ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְיִצְפֹּר מֵהַר הַגִּלְעָד יָשֹׁב‎</span> [[Judg.7.3|Judg 7:3]] ***let him return and*** ([[BDB#Vrss|Vrss]]) ***let him depart***, [[BDB#AV|AV]] ***depart early*** (as [[BDB#Ki|Ki]], from Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎צפרא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***morning***, improbable), wholly uncertain; [[BDB#Gr|Gr]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְיַעֲבִר‎</span>; on difficulty of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵהַר הַגּ‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גִּלְעָד‎</span> 

**2.** and [[BDB#GFM|GFM]], who conjectures <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְיִצְרְפֵם גִּדְעֹן‎</span> and so ***Gideson put them to test*** (compare v[[Judg.7.4|Judg 7:4]]), so [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] [[BDB#Now|Now]] (compare [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]<sup>Hast. ii. 176</sup> ***n***).
